title: Huawei launches first phones capable of running its new self-developed operating system
content: Huawei launched the Mate 70, Mate 70 Pro and Mate 70 Pro+ and foldable Mate X6 on Tuesday that can run HarmonyOS NEXT, its self-developed operating system.
summary: Huawei launched the Mate 70, Mate 70 Pro and Mate 70 Pro+ and foldable Mate X6 on Tuesday that can run HarmonyOS NEXT, its self-developed operating system.

title: Trump vows an additional 10% tariff on China, 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico
content: The president-elect plans to raise tariffs by an additional 10% on all Chinese goods coming into the U.S., according to a post on his social media platform Truth Social.
summary: The president-elect plans to raise tariffs by an additional 10% on all Chinese goods coming into the U.S., according to a post on his social media platform Truth Social.

title: Heathrow boss says 2025 to bring final decision on controversial third runway
content: Thomas Woldbye told the Airlines 2024 conference he expected a final decision "one way or another" on the long-running project by the end of 2025.

title: Six travelers in Laos died from suspected tainted alcohol. Here's where most incidents occur
content: Six travelers have died from suspected methanol poisoning in Vang Vieng, Laos. Most of these incidents occur in Asia, according to Doctors Without Borders.
summary: Six travelers have died from suspected methanol poisoning in Vang Vieng, Laos. Most of these incidents occur in Asia, according to Doctors Without Borders.

title: Meet the start-up working to save newborn babies and democratize pregnancy care
content: More than two million babies died in the first 20 days of their lives in 2022, and a startup, Biorithm, hopes to help prevent this with its monitoring device.

title: Singapore's inflation rate falls in October, hitting lowest point since March 2021
